snippet: Miami trailed by 12 in the opening minutes and dug its way out of a 6-point hole in the final 3 minutes 2 seconds of regulation to beat Dallas.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat defeat Dallas Mavericks, 119-109, in overtime; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Miami trailed by 12 in the opening minutes and dug its way out of a 6-point hole in the final 3 minutes 2 seconds of regulation to beat Dallas.

headline.seo: Heat Rally to Beat Mavericks in Overtime
headline.main: Heat Rally Early, Rally Late and Then Cruise Through Overtime
headline.print_headline: Heat Rally Early, Rally Late and Then Cruise Through Overtime
